name: White Wolf - Treasure Hunter
description:
White Wolf - Treasure Hunter
Begin adventure in the snow land where "White Wolf" lives finding treasure on a hunt. Finds hidden snow cave of treasure chest opening up than something bad come out the chest that created evil "Dark Wolf" with magic powers to mess with your mind to enter land of temples of 5 elements to save yourself of being controlled by the evil came out of chest. Adventure Begins!

* Play as "White Wolf" character running, time limit, collecting items, limit jumping watch energy, melee tail, long jump tail distance, picking up & throwing items at enemies.
* Going though levels avoiding or confronting enemies to find coins end of the level to complete enter next level.
* Go jump though the card picture level in middle platform to get to next level area figure out pattern forward, backwards, or mixed way to finish game ending!?
* Explore the 5 Element temples of Snow, Forest, Sand, Sky & Shadow in evil wonderful land of mystery.
* Finish your way to each level collect wolf coins get to unlock final temple finish "Dark Wolf" free yourself from the evil magic.
